name: Harris 1983 Top Business Leaders Survey, study no. 831004
description: This telephone survey of top business leaders in the U.S. focuses on the economy Additional variables include future of the economy, the GNP, questions about respondents own businesses, inflation, borrowing and the trade deficit
citation: Louis Harris and Associates, Inc., 2014, "Harris 1983 Top Business Leaders Survey, study no. 831004", http://hdl.handle.net/1902.29/H-831004
